sub_topic: Calculating the boiling and melting points of inorganic compounds
message_1: What would be the melting point of the inorganic compound Magnesium Oxychloride (MgCl2∙O) at a pressure of 1 atm? Show the calculations used to arrive at the answer, and explain the significance of the obtained value.
